BugInstance.message: com.hexaware.MLP319.model.Coupon.getDateCoupon() may expose internal representation by returning Coupon.dateCoupon
new com.hexaware.MLP319.model.Coupon(String, Date, int, int) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Coupon.dateCoupon
com.hexaware.MLP319.model.Coupon.setDateCoupon(Date) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into Coupon.dateCoupon
